meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking a clear organization or hierarchy.
meanings.sent1: In the meeting, the structurelessnesses made it hard to determine who was in charge.
meanings.sent2: The structurelessnesses of the group led to confusion about roles and responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The structurelessnesses of the team meeting turned it into a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of structurelessnesses, making it difficult to focus.
meanings.sent5: The structurelessnesses of the puzzle made it impossible to solve.

meanings.definition: The absence of a defined system or framework.
meanings.sent1: Without clear guidelines, the project suffered from structurelessnesses.
meanings.sent2: The structurelessnesses of the plan left everyone feeling lost.
meanings.sent3: The structurelessnesses of the schedule caused delays and confusion.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a jumble of structurelessnesses, lacking direction.
meanings.sent5: Navigating the maze was challenging due to the structurelessnesses of its design.

meanings.definition: A condition of being without a formal structure or order.
meanings.sent1: The structurelessnesses of the organization led to inefficiency.
meanings.sent2: Her essay reflected the structurelessnesses of her thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The structurelessnesses of the event planning resulted in chaos.
meanings.sent4: The structurelessnesses of the garden gave it a wild, untamed look.
meanings.sent5: The structurelessnesses of the book made it hard to follow the plot.
